comments: Visiting professor at Kenyon. Great teacher. He really knows the history of multiple Latin American countries in and out. Loves to use the word phenomenal. 4 papers on books we read in class, all were clear cut, and if you put some effort into them, he\'ll give you an A. Extremely helpful outside of class and loves talking about sports.
Very helpful and easy to work with. A lot of reading but it\'s mostly interesting. 4 papers (4-6 pgs) in 5 weeks but he explained what he wanted well so they were easy to write.
